a)       FEDFISH-LAG requires credit passes in                
English Language, Mathematics, Physics,     
           Geography and any one (1) of the following            
Chemistry, Technical Drawing and Economics/             
Commerce.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
  
a.   FEDFISH-LAG requires Mathematics, Physics         
and Geography.

KWA-POLY requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Physics, Fine Art, Statistics, Sheet Metal/ 
Structural Steel Work, Arc./Gas Welding, Fitting,  
Drilling and Grinding, Vehicle Body Building, 
Turning, Milling, Shaping, Planning and Slotting, 
Vehicle Painting and  Trimming and Body Repair 
Work  as requirements for Metallurgy Engineering  
Technology.  
FEDPOIDA requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Physics, Mathematics and Chem. and one (1) of 
the subjects listed in column   
FEDPOIDA offers the course as Metallurgical 
Engineering Technology.  
KEB-POLY offers it as Metal Engineering 
Technology.  
   e)   YABATECH  –  Same  as  in  Mechanical  
Engineering Technology.  
   f)  PLS-POLY requires four (4) ‘O’ level credit passes 
in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and 
any one (1) of Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural 
Science, Technical Drawing, Biology, Geography, 
Economics.
